description: Eliminate `unknown` types and replace with proper TypeScript interfaces
steps: Create proper TypeScript interfaces for Navidrome Album, Song, and Artist types (currently marked as `unknown` in lidarr-navidrome.ts lines 20, 186, 252)
Replace `as any` type assertions in preferences.ts (lines 193, 237) with proper type narrowing
Remove `@ts-ignore` and `eslint-disable` comments by properly typing navigator.connection API
Add generics to MobileOptimization cache methods for compile-time type safety
